column5: Okay i have a video on site but lost it on my actual  computer.  Is there anyway i can save this back to my computer  i have tryed but am having no success....Any help would be very much appreciated,  Thankyou....  This is one of my vids some of you have seen from 2006 season,This is the one i am trying to save to my computer.  http://www.zippyvideos.com/345712603520796...of_may2-4_week/

From ZippyVideos.com...   How can I download a video to my computer ?  Unfortunately this isn't possible at the moment.  There may be a way to capture it using a program, check out this link:  http://www.canadiancontent.net/tech/downlo...e-Programs.html  Disclaimer: Not responsible for any problems caused by these programs

Maybe the 'System Restore" feature on yer computer.  I will restore your computer back to a previous date week, etc, so that if you accidently erased the video, you could get it back.

Well there is a way to download the video.  First got to   http://www.benjaminstrahs.com/ and download and install Ares Tube. Read the instructionc carefully on the webpage.  Select Zippy Videos when you launch Ares tube. In the seach box enter Fishin with family & freinds'   (NO quotes). I just copied the name of the video and then pasted it in the search box.  Maximize the Ares tube window.  Click on the video you want to download. Ares tube is still active, click on the green + sign to add this video for downloading.  In options tab at the bottom set the output folder and file type.  Click on DOWNLOAD.  When I did it id downloaded as a FLV (Flash) file. I use a free FLV palyer to play it back.  Cheers......muddler
Haven't seen that in a long time. Sometimes it's neccessary.
